messages.title: With your help – and your vote for my local candidate, Jack Rankin – together we can get Brexit right and secure our economic future
messages.content: Asking for vote for Jack Rankin and focusing on securing Brexit and economic stability.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Guarantee economic security by getting Brexit done.
New trade deals for goods and services.
Enable people to own a home.
Good school place for every child.
Strong economy to pay for a strong NHS.
A more secure and united Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's nonsense for the local Labour Party to say that a vote for Angela Rayner in Ashton-under-Lyne doesn't matter nationally.

issues.brexitEurope: With a strong negotiating hand on Brexit, we can guarantee our economic security by getting Brexit done.
issues.economy: Strong negotiating hand on Brexit guarantees economic security. Build a stronger economy that rewards people.
issues.education: Make sure there is a good school place for every child.
issues.health: Strong economy to pay for a strong NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: Make sure people who work hard can create secure and well-paid jobs.

community.content: Support our candidate Jack Rankin, who is an excellent local candidate to deliver results for Ashton-under-Lyne.

endorsements.endorsement: With your help - and your vote for my local candidate, Jack Rankin - together we can get Brexit right and secure our economic future.

quotes.text: Strong and stable leadership for Ashton, Droylsden and Failsworth and for Britain.

examples: New trade deals for goods and services.

Enable people to own a home.

Make sure people who work hard can create secure and well-paid jobs.
Support our candidate Jack Rankin, who is an excellent local candidate to deliver results for Ashton-under-Lyne.
Theresa May's plan for a stronger Britain.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Ashton born and bred – born here, grew up here, and still lives here.

examples: Ashton born and bred – born here, grew up here.
